table.name: av_agent_active_status
table.description: Tracks the online and offline status of agents.

column.description: Indicates whether the agent is online.
Indicates whether the agent is offline.
Unique identifier for the organization unit.
Unique identifier for the account.
Scope or context of the data.
Agent's email address.
Agent's location.
Skills associated with the agent.
Timestamp of the event.
Timestamp when the record was inserted.

table.name: av_agent_offline_reasons
table.description: Tracks the reasons why agents go offline.

column.description: Turnaround time for going offline.
Timestamp of the offline event.
Unique identifier for the organization unit.
Unique identifier for the account.
Scope or context of the data.
Reason for going offline.
Timestamp when the agent came back online.
Agent's email address.
Agent's location.
Timestamp when the record was inserted.

table.name: av_call_details
table.description: Details of calls handled by agents.

column.description: Indicates whether the user was in a call.
Unique identifier for the organization unit.
Unique identifier for the task.
Unique identifier for the AV session.
Name of the event in the call.
Unique identifier for the account.
Unique identifier for the allocation.
Unique identifier for the operator session.
Name of the queue the call was handled in.
Final state of the session.
Reason for the final state of the session.
Timestamp of the event.
Version of the application.
Scope or context of the data.
Unique identifier for the event.
Timestamp when the record was inserted.
No metric is defined for this table.

table.name: av_completed_tasks_v2
table.description: Details of completed tasks in version 2.

column.description: Duration of the call.
Time MSC started after all participants joined.
Average outgoing bitrate for the customer.
Average incoming bitrate for the customer.
Average outgoing bitrate for the operator.
Average incoming bitrate for the operator.
90th percentile outgoing bitrate for the customer.
90th percentile incoming bitrate for the customer.
90th percentile outgoing bitrate for the operator.

90th percentile output audio level for the customer.
